description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Items and quantities are listed below:
full_summary:
Tender Notice: Request for Proposal (RFP) for SWITCH, MEMBRANE
======================================================

**Title:** Procurement of SWITCH and MEMBRANE Items
**Reference Number:** cb-245-40972558
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-242373/A
**Publication Date:** December 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of the following items:

* Item 1:  Switch, Membrane, NSN: 01-422-9046, Part Number: 593-6961230, Naval Sea Systems Command, CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia (15 units)
* Item 2: Switch, Membrane, NSN: 01-422-9046, Part Number: 593-6961230, Naval Sea Systems Command, CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia (10 units)

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to Canadian suppliers under the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Tender Timeline:**

* Tender Closing Date: January 12, 2024, 14:00:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined

**Selection Criteria:**
The lowest priced proposal will be selected.

**Language of Bid:**
Bidders must submit their proposals in the official language of their choice, English or French.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit, Contracting Authority:
```
Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit, Contracting Authority
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Phone: (819) 939-3725
Email: [Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Anthony.Lemoine-Hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca)
```
**Notice URL:**
No notice URL is provided.

**Attachments:**
The contracting authority
